maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Привет!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea, chérie...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Лея, chérie (дорогая)...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Now that I think about it...\. I really acted like the worst, non?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Теперь, когда я думаю об этом...\. я действительно вела себя ужасно, не так ли?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I just kept poking you about your real life...\. like...\. all the time!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Я продолжала доставать тебя твоей реальной жизнью...\. почти...\. всё время!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Not to mention how I reacted after the raid...\. urgh.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Не говоря уже о том, как я отреагировала после рейда...\. ухмм.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I'm so,\. so sorry.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Мне так,\. так жаль.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [мотает головой]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I...\. I just didn't know any better, but still...\. I'm sorry.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Я...\. Я просто не знала, как лучше поступить, но всё равно...\. Прости.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I just want you to know that you really are a dear friend to me.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Я просто хочу, чтобы ты знала, что ты для меня очень дорогой друг.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It doesn't matter if you are an AI or anything else!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Неважно, искусственный интеллект ты или ещё что!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Thanks.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Спасибо.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It really is a bummer, that Tronny isn't around for all of this.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Такой облом, что Тронни нет рядом с нами.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: He really is such a dork. A nice dork, though.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Он такой придурок. Хороший придурок, правда.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Let's hope he will show up again eventually.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Будем надеяться, что он появится снова в конце концов.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Spheromancer Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Сферомант Лея!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Лея.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: What is it? I'm calling you by your name now, am I not?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: В чём дело? Я зову тебя по имени, разве нет?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Лея.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Wait...\. Do you want me to drop the "Spheromancer" part as well?
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Подожди...\. Ты хочешь, чтобы я ещё и отбросил "сфероманта"?

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I'm afraid I'd never do that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Боюсь, я бы никогда этого не сделал.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It is a noble title every player of our class should wear with pride!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Это благородное звание, которое каждый игрок нашего класса должен носить с гордостью!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: ...Thanks.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: ...Спасибо.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alright, fine! But only this one time.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ладно, хорошо! Но только один раз.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea...\. so now that the truth is out, it seems I was right!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Лея...\. теперь, когда истина раскрыта, кажется, я был прав!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: From the very beginning you have been cheating!!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ты жульничала с самого начала!!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Okay... with your \c[1]insane attack damage\c[0] it was rather obvious.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ладно... с твоим \c[1]безумным уроном\c[0] это было довольно очевидно.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: However! Given the circumstances at the time, I suppose it's fair to let it slide.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Тем не менее! Учитывая обстоятельства того времени, я полагаю, было бы справедливо закрыть на это глаза.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Besides...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: К тому же...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Sphe...\. Lea.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Сфер...\. Лея.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I beseech you to find the means to disable that \c[1]disgraceful damage glitch\c[0]!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Я умоляю тебя, найди способ отключить этот \c[1]бесчестный глюк с уроном\c[0]!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Only then can you master this game as a true, honorable Spheromancer!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Только тогда ты сможешь освоить эту игру как честный, благородный сферомант!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: When that time has come, I'll gladly challenge you to another duel!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Когда это время придёт, я с радостью вызову тебя на ещё одну дуэль!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I am actually very proud of you!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Я на самом деле очень горжусь тобой!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: You've grown into a prime example of a Spheromancer!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ты стала отличным примером сфероманта!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Looking back, I have to say it has been an honor to have had you as such a capable opponent.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Оглядываясь назад, я должен сказать, что для меня было честью иметь такого способного противника.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: And indeed, you've shown me that there is still potential for me to grow as well.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: И воистину, ты показала мне, что у меня ещё есть потенциал для развития.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: And while you didn't quite reach my level of expertise, you definitely came close!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: И хоть ты и не достигла моего уровня мастерства, ты определённо приблизилась к нему!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Thanks!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Спасибо!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Now it's time for our greatest act of justice so far! I hope you are ready!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Теперь пришло время для нашего величайшего акта справедливости! Я надеюсь, что ты готова!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Лея!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Poor girl...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Бедная девочка...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: You must have had a hard time, not being able to talk, not knowing about yourself.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ты, должно быть, испытывала трудности, не имея возможности говорить, не зная ничего о себе.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It probably didn't help that Polly kept bothering you on top of that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: То, что Полли доставал тебя, вероятно, тоже не пошло на пользу, ко всему прочему.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: But really, Lea, you're a strong girl.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Но на самом деле, Лея, ты сильная девочка.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: From what Sergey told us, you really must have gone through a lot.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Из того, что Сергей рассказал нам, ты действительно прошла через многое.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Yet here you are, still happily saying "Hi" to everyone.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: И несмотря ни на что, ты всё ещё с радостью говоришь всем "Привет".

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Привет!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Just like that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Именно так.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It's always a joy to play together with you!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Играть с тобой всегда приятно!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Plus, it was very entertaining to watch you beat up Polly like that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Плюс, было очень интересно наблюдать за тем, как ты побеждаешь Полли.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: But don't tell him I said that.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Но не говори ему, что я это сказал.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alright, listen everyone.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Хорошо, слушайте все.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Behind this door lies \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: За этой дверью простирается \c[3]Пустошь Вермиллион\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Let us quickly discuss how we will proceed from here.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Давайте быстро обсудим, как мы будем действовать дальше.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Our goal is to assemble as many \c[3]Evotars\c[0] as we can find, get them close to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] to the east and then subject them to a certain \c[3]field effect\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Наша цель - собрать как можно больше \c[3]эвотаров\c[0], заманить их ближе к \c[3]Квест-хабу\c[0] на востоке, а затем подвергнуть определённому \c[3]эффекту поля\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: We need to do this as fast as possible. That's why I suggest we split in \c[3]3 teams\c[0].
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Мы должны сделать это как можно быстрее. Вот почему я предлагаю разделиться на \c[3]три команды\c[0].

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: \c[3]Team A\c[0] will run straight to the Quest Hub and deal with all Evotars of that area.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: \c[3]Команда А\c[0] побежит прямо к Квест-хабу и разберётся со всеми эвотарами в этой области.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I suggest that Lea is part of that team.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Предлагаю Лее быть в этой команде.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Then I'll join Team A as well!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Тогда я тоже присоединюсь к команде А!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Lukas, you too!\. No more level excuses!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Лукас, ты тоже!\. Больше никаких отмазок!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alright!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ладно!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Good...
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Хорошо...

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Then we need two more teams tasked with \c[3]gathering all Evotars of the area\c[0] and leading them to the Quest Hub.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Затем нам нужны ещё две команды, которые должны \c[3]собрать всех эвотаров в области\c[0] и привести к Квест-хабу.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: \c[3]Team B\c[0] will take care of the \c[3]forest\c[0] in the north and \c[3]Team C\c[0] the \c[3]river delta\c[0] in the south.
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: \c[3]Команда B\c[0] позаботится о \c[3]лесе\c[0] на севере, а \c[3]Команда C\c[0] о \c[3]дельте реки\c[0] на юге.

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Joern and I will take care of the forest!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Мы с Йорном возьмём на себя лес!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Alrighty! That leaves Buggy, Al, and me for Team C!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ладненько! Тогда остаются Багги, Ал и я для команды С!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Perfect, we're all set!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Замечательно, у нас всё готово!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Everyone, get ready!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Всем приготовиться!

maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Operation start!!
maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-03.json/enti.text: Операция началась!!
